text.section: A majority of the Commission is a quorum.
The Commission shall meet in the State at the times that it or its chairman determines.

A member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Commission; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The Commission shall:
maintain minutes of its meetings and any other records that it considers necessary; and
provide information, on request, regarding the budget, activities, and programs of the Commission.
